actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to provide that the moratorium on fringe benefit taxation (P.L. 95-427) applies to the value of certain campus housing furnished by educational institutions to their employees.

summary.text: Provides that the moratorium on fringe benefit taxation applies to the value of housing furnished by educational institutions to their employees if: (1) the housing is located on a campus of, or in the proximity of, such institution; and (2) such institution has a reasonable basis for not treating the value of such housing as subject to taxation.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the moratorium on fringe benefit taxation (P.L. 95-427) applies to the value of certain campus housing furnished by educational institutions to their employees.
